scenes.background: You decide to help out for a few hours. [Monica] and [Bob] join the discussion.
scenes.description: [Monica] says, 'I appreciate you stepping in. Can you handle the report while Bob and I work on the presentation?'

options.text: Sure, I can manage the report. Just keep me updated on any changes.
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and empathy, but may struggle with motivation due to the unexpected task.

options.text: I can help with the report, but I'll need some assistance from you both to ensure it's done right.
options.analysis: You balance your social skills and motivation well, but your empathy could be seen as lacking by not fully taking on the task independently.

options.text: I think it would be more effective if we all focus on the presentation and tackle the report afterwards.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and social skills, but your emotional perception is lower as you shift the task priorities.
